short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add useful features to the Gitlab interface by Canal+

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Gitlab Refined allows a more productive work environment by simplifying and adding features on top of the Gitlab interface. 

Sometimes the Gitlab Interface doesn't always match everyone's need, this extension will permits a more flexible interface by adding/disabling features. 

The extension will use DOM elements and Gitlab API to edit the page."
